articles.title: Future of space: Could AI robots replace human astronauts? - BBC.com
articles.description: Advances in technology raise questions about the need to send people to space - and the risks and cost
articles.content: On Christmas Eve, an autonomous spacecraft flew past the Sun, closer than any human-made object before it. Swooping through the atmosphere, Nasa's Parker Solar Probe was on a mission to discover more… [+10133 chars]
